Most Acoustic Models used by ' Open Source ' Speech Recognition engines are ' Closed Source ' .They do not give you access to the speech audio ( the ' Source ' ) used to create the Acoustic Model .The reason for this is that there is no free Speech Corpus in a form that can readily be used to create Acoustic Models for Speech Recognition Engines .
